Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: EC
Reviews.Content: I really love the camera and the package it came with.  Customer service is extremely helpful should you have any questions

Reviews.Title: Not nice people
Reviews.Author: LuckyMo
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the camera and pack that I received, however the telescopic lens was missing (only for me to call and they say it's on back order, with no note to tell me so). Also, this DOES NOT COME WITH 18-55MM LENS!! From product description and photo it looks like it would come with it, the one on the camera. I called them twice only to be told "you got two other lenses, so what". And the accessories are a lower end quality, yet still do it's purpose. Was not happy with the sellers, but am happy with the product, for what it came with.Canon EOS Rebel T3 (1100d) SLR Digital Camera W/tamron 28-80mm & 75-300mm Lens, 3 Extra Lens, Hdmi Cable, 8gb Sdhc Memory Card, Soft Carrying Cases, Hdmi Cable, Tripod & Much More !!

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot
DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor, 2.7" Clear View LCD
Full HD Movie Mode, 100-6400 ISO
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses, 63 Zone Dual-Layer System / 9 Point AF
3 fps Continuous Shooting, Basic + Function / Creative Auto
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 (1100d) SLR Digital Camera W/tamron 28-80mm & 75-300mm Lens, 3 Extra Lens, Hdmi Cable, 8gb Sdhc Memory Card, Soft Carrying Cases, Hdmi Cable, Tripod & Much More !!
